conclusion_v1.one_sentence_pattern: The schedule window is stretching and reshaping faster than it can absorb new work.
conclusion_v1.decision: Reset the scheduling window before accepting more lead-time risk.
conclusion_v1.boundary: Pause new non-urgent bookings until lead time stabilizes.
conclusion_v1.why_this_now: Lead-time and reschedules are stacking in the current window.

conclusion_v1.one_sentence_pattern: Volume is rising while the average job is worth less or takes longer to finish.
conclusion_v1.decision: Protect the value floor before volume sets the pace.
conclusion_v1.boundary: Decline low-value work that stretches completion time.
conclusion_v1.why_this_now: Ticket size is not keeping pace with rising volume.

conclusion_v1.one_sentence_pattern: Cash timing is stretching beyond the pace the work is delivered.
conclusion_v1.decision: Tighten payment timing before it slips further.
conclusion_v1.boundary: Hold new starts that dont meet current payment timing.
conclusion_v1.why_this_now: Late timing is widening past the current buffer.

conclusion_v1.boundary: Decline work that requires repeated adjustments for low payoff.
conclusion_v1.why_this_now: Fit friction is showing up during a tighter crew window.
